question: I would like to know if it is allowed to attend a Hindu wedding, or any other non-muslim wedding, during Ramadaan
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to know if it is allowed to attend a Hindu wedding, or any other non-muslim wedding, during Ramadaan
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to attend to any non-Muslim wedding at anytime ? Ramadhaan or out of Ramadhaan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
